summary: The eccentric professor Oscar Collins lives completely secluded in his chaotic apartment. When a model (Penny Lane) and her photographer boyfriend move in next to him, he becomes fascinated... See full summary »
cast: Jack MacGowran|Jane Birkin|Irene Handl|Richard Wattis|Iain Quarrier|Beatrix Lehmann|Brian Walsh|Sean Lynch|Bee Duffell|Noel Trevarthen|Marijke Koger|Josje Leeger|Simon Posthuma|Suki Potier|Anita Pallenberg
title: El muro mágico
